thread.section_title: TAXIBOX mobile self-storage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TAXIBOX mobile self-storage | www.taxibox.com.au | 3 of 12
thread.title: Damian J
thread.title_full: TAXIBOX mobile self-storage reviewed by Damian J

author: Damian J
title: Damian J
text:
I stored the contents of a bedroom, plus several other large items (couch, refrigerator, TV, dryer, shelves) in a single Taxibox for seven months this year. Having never placed my belongings into storage before, I was somewhat trepidatious about the undertaking. The Taxibox team could not have made the experience (from the first booking to the final drop-off) any more seamless or pleasing. All staff members (and I spoke to quite a number over the seven months, both on the phone and in person) were very friendly, helpful, and treated all questio ns seriously - even the ones I was pretty sure were the 'stupid ones'.
I only once had to access my Taxibox during its' time in storage, shortly before it was re-delivered. This was required at very short notice, and I was given plenty of time and access space.
Perhaps my highest praise would go to the re-delivery: my new home had limited parking available, making the drop-off tricky. Despite this, the team went to enormous lengths to work through the issue with me at a time when I was otherwise very busy with other aspects of the move. Their patience and flexibility made the re-delivery easily the most seamless part of my most recent house move, which did not go unappreciated.
I was also pleasantly surprised to learn there would be no re-delivery charge, as I had stored for longer than six months. No complaint there. The overall cost of the storage was very reasonable and affordable.
I will be using Taxibox for my next storage endeavour and began recommending it to friends months before my storage had even concluded.
